HomePage.title: Does your website appear in AI searches?
HomePage.heroText: AI search engines work differently than traditional search engines. Losing visibility in the new search stream could mean losing 30-40% of your traffic.

feature1.title: AI Visibility Analysis
feature1.description: Check how your site appears in all AI tools like ChatGPT, Bing AI, and Google.

feature2.title: Improvement Recommendations
feature2.description: Get site-specific optimization suggestions to improve visibility in AI searches.

feature3.title: Regular Reports
feature3.description: Regularly monitor your site's performance in AI tools and see your progress.
